careerOptions.title: Product Designer
careerOptions.description: We're looking for an individual to come up with new product designs that meet the needs and wants of consumers.

qualification.point: MBA/PG degree from a top-tier college5+ years of relevant work experience preferred in a startup ecosystem
5+ years of relevant work experience preferred in a startup ecosystem
A hustler mindset
Leadership skills- Ability to influence and inspire your team while steering your products in the best directions possible
Strong ability to build a product vision and communicate that vision
